brand_info.name: BMW
brand_info.positioning: Premium performance-led mobility brand combining driving dynamics, progressive design, and advanced technology.
brand_info.vision: Combine top-flight mobility with innovative technologies to contribute to a more sustainable world.
brand_info.mission: Deliver premium mobility solutions that unite driving pleasure, design quality, and technological progress across products and services.
brand_info.origin_story: Foundation date recognized as 7 March 1916, rooted in Munich, Bavaria, with early aerospace engineering heritage that evolved into motorcycles and automobiles.

brand_values.brand_promise: Dynamic, premium mobility that feels precise, confident, and emotionally engaging.
differentiators: Progressive design with premium fit and finish
Innovation spanning electrification, digital services, and efficiency technologies
non_negotiables: No gimmicky or cartoonish visual language

psychographics.lifestyle: Urban and suburban professionals who value performance, design, and technology, and who see mobility as both utility and personal expression
psychographics.behavior: Research-driven buyers, brand loyalists, early adopters for new powertrains and digital features, active in premium lifestyle culture

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Direct, performance-led, and design-aware with restrained emotional uplift tied to joy of driving
avoid: Overly technical jargon without experience translation

logo.primary_logo: BMW roundel (blue and white) with BMW wordmark
logo.usage_rules: Use the roundel as a premium signature mark with generous clear space; avoid placing over complex texture or low-contrast areas; never distort, recolor, or add effects
logo.lockup_behavior: Roundel positioned with strict alignment to grid; typically corner placement or centered end-frame in motion
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the roundel radius on all sides

color_system.color_usage_rules: High-contrast premium neutrals dominate; BMW blues appear as controlled accents in branding and UI moments rather than full-scene washes

typography.secondary_font: Modern neutral sans-serif fallback for digital interfaces

layout_principles.grid_system: Modular grid with strong alignment and generous margins
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: Controlled to generous, especially in end-frames and print key-visuals
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-led, text used sparingly as performance or concept anchor
layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower corners or end-frame centered, minimal
layout_principles.alignment: Geometric, precise, and consistent across formats

style.camera_feel: High-end automotive advertising with controlled motion cues and a premium, engineered finish
style.pose_guidelines: Vehicles staged with purposeful stance; if talent appears, posture is composed, confident, and functional to the mobility moment
style.casting_attitude: Premium modern, confident, understated; focus remains on vehicle experience and design

technical.lighting: Sculpted studio or natural light with crisp edge definition; night scenes use controlled highlights and reflective surfaces
technical.contrast: Medium to high with clean blacks and controlled highlights
technical.grain: Minimal to subtle, modern clean finish
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; selective focus used to emphasize design lines, headlight signatures, and brand details
technical.color_grading: Neutral-cool with metallic clarity; accents in BMW blue and warm practical lights where narrative requires

model_casting.attitude: Calm confidence, intelligent presence, no theatrical acting

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Vehicle remains primary hero; brand signatures and design details are highlighted with intent
product_presentation.styling_approach: Clean, premium, minimal distraction; environment supports lines, stance, and light behavior on surfaces

motion_rules.pacing: Controlled acceleration cues, smooth camera movement, confident rhythm
motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, elegant match cuts on form lines, minimal effects

visual_dos: Use clean reflections to reveal form
Show purposeful motion or implied motion
Keep brand marks crisp and unobtrusive

interactive_elements: Immersive lighting that reveals surface form
retail.soundscape: Modern minimal ambient with subtle mechanical and electric cues

digital.tone_adjustment: More product and feature clarity, still premium and restrained

platform_behavior.Instagram: Hero form, detail reels, controlled motion, minimal copy overlays
platform_behavior.Website: Config-driven journeys, clean UI, strong imagery, technical benefits translated into experience
platform_behavior.Newsletter: High-impact hero visuals, concise feature highlights, clear CTA

print.paper: Premium coated or matte stock depending on series, always high-fidelity reproduction
print.cover_rules: Full-bleed hero vehicle, minimal headline, roundel as precise signature

logo_misuse_examples: Roundel placed on low contrast background
Distortion, stretch, or added effects to logo
